frontmatter.title: Release 11.0
frontmatter.intro: Figma migration, further bundle-size reductions, and replacement of privacy settings dialog

frontmatter.title: Release 10.1
frontmatter.intro: New web components, à la carte web component bundles, further bundle-size reductions, and analytics updates

frontmatter.title: Release 10.0
frontmatter.intro: Reduced JavaScript bundle sizes, improved web components, removed deprecated font classes, and cleaned up tokens

frontmatter.title: Release 9.0
frontmatter.intro: Differentiating between labels, hints, and errors, standardizing dialog close buttons, improving the drawer and dialog APIs, consolidating configuration functions, and refining typography design tokens.

frontmatter.title: Sketch UI Kit release 6.0
frontmatter.intro: Sketch Cleanup / Design Debt work to improve accuracy and consistency in Sketch UI design libraries. Applies to Core, HealthCare & Medicare

frontmatter.title: Release 8.0
frontmatter.intro: Getting ready for Open Enrollment season

frontmatter.title: Release 7.0
frontmatter.intro: Normalizing CSS, standardizing spacing & colors, a new Dropdown, and more

frontmatter.title: Release 6.0
frontmatter.intro: Shipping CSS instead of Sass, introducing new masked fields, streamlining ZIP code patterns, and more

frontmatter.title: Release 5.0
frontmatter.intro: Hey everyone, we're doing something new! We've saved up a program increment's worth of updates into a single release, and it's going out with a little fanfare.
